lead_paragraph: Jim Margolis and his team at GMMB – one of the lead media firms for the Obama campaign – has helped craft, hone and sell President Obama’s message since 2007. But Mr. Margolis’s touch and style can be found on many other campaigns, dating back to Bill Clinton’s 1992 presidential bid.
